newsitem.title: FRANCE: ONIC supply/demand report to be released April 16.
newsitem.headline: ONIC supply/demand report to be released April 16.

text.p: French cereals office ONIC will issue its next monthly supply/demand report on April 16, the third Wednesday of the month instead of the usual second Wednesday, an ONIC official said on Tuesday.
The change is due to the absence of senior ONIC officials on a routine grain visit to China organised by French wheat growers, the official said.

ONIC director general Alain Moulinier and international affairs director Michel Ferret are part of the team in China this week, which also includes representatives from private French trade firms Soufflet, Sigma and Champagne Cereales.

French grain industry sources said on Monday that ONIC was not expected to make major changes to its grain estimates in the new report, adding that a cut in barley stocks was the main outcome of a drafting session last week.
The ONIC official said the office never commented on its supply/demand estimates ahead of publication.
